title: Rattler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Each night you may choose someone to rattle. Any non-Town visitors they receive will become rattled. Rattled players will receive the picture attached to this role card in their private chat, and they will be roleblocked the following night. You will not be notified if you rattle someone.

desc:
Post 559
*I've got a bone to pick with you!*
Roleblock Immune
